overview:
Innovator and experienced in international patenting is actually co-founding EdjWonders, a startup company focused on Digital Advertising technologies for Mobile Platform like the Apple iPhone.

Experienced senior software architect in the past with strong maturity on software engineering and technology team leading. Strongly focused on Media industry and experienced in the advertisement business and in general in leading edge technologies like IPTV, DRM, Digital Television Broadcasting, CA, Web TV, Media technologies, RIA/RAD environments and Interactivity platforms. Worked as full time Microsoft employee from 1992 until 2004.
